name: Intel Converged Security and Management Engine竞争条件漏洞
description: Intel Converged Security and Management Engine是英特尔在芯片组中嵌入的微控制器，用于提供系统管理、安全及低功耗功能。Intel Converged Security and Management Engine存在竞争条件漏洞，目前没有详细的漏洞细节提供。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://intel.com/content/www/us/en/security-center/advisory/intel-sa-01280.html
patch: Intel Converged Security and Management Engine竞争条件漏洞的补丁
